title: [Question] why libATen.so is not a symlink to libATen.so.1 ?
body_html:
I found that libATen.so is identical to libATen.so.1 in torch/lib. It seems that it should be a symlink?

  • OS: Arch Linux
  • PyTorch version: master
  • How you installed PyTorch (conda, pip, source): source
  • Python version: 3.6
  • CUDA/cuDNN version: 9.1/7.1.1
  • GCC version (if compiling from source): 5.5.0
body_text:

body:
I found that `libATen.so` is identical to `libATen.so.1` in torch/lib.  It seems that it should be a symlink?

- OS: Arch Linux
- PyTorch version: master
- How you installed PyTorch (conda, pip, source): source
- Python version: 3.6
- CUDA/cuDNN version: 9.1/7.1.1
- GCC version (if compiling from source): 5.5.0
